Light.name: Light
Light.description: This spell causes an object to glow like a torch, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius.

Resistance.name: Resistance
Resistance.description: You imbue the subject with magical energy that protects it from harm, granting it a +1 resistance bonus on saves.

Acid Splash.name: Acid Splash
Acid Splash.description: You fire a small orb of acid at the target. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack to hit your target.

Daze.name: Daze
Daze.target: One humanoid creature of 4 HD or less
Daze.description: This spell clouds the mind of a humanoid creature with 4 or fewer Hit Dice so that it takes no actions.

Cure Light Wounds.name: Cure Light Wounds
Cure Light Wounds.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +5).

Inflict Light Wounds.name: Inflict Light Wounds
Inflict Light Wounds.description: When laying your hand upon a creature, you channel negative energy that deals 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +5).

Bless.name: Bless
Bless.target: The caster and all allies within a 50-ft. burst
Bless.description: Bless fills your allies with courage. Each affected creature gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and on saving throws against fear effects.

Divine Favor.name: Divine Favor
Divine Favor.description: Calling upon the strength and wisdom of a deity, you gain a +1 luck bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls for every three caster levels you have (at least +1, maximum +3).

Magic Missile.name: Magic Missile
Magic Missile.target: Up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apart
Magic Missile.description: A missile of magical energy darts forth from your fingertip and strikes its target, dealing 1d4+1 points of force damage.

Burning Hands.name: Burning Hands
Burning Hands.description: A cone of searing flame shoots from your fingertips. Any creature in the area of the flames takes 1d4 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 5d4).

Mage Armor.name: Mage Armor
Mage Armor.description: An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.target: One or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
Sleep.description: A sleep spell causes a magical slumber to come upon 4 Hit Dice of creatures. Creatures with the fewest HD are affected first.
